thread.section_title: Temple & Webster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Temple & Webster | templeandwebster.com.au
thread.title: Julie Johanson
thread.title_full: Temple & Webster reviewed by Julie Johanson

author: Julie Johanson
title: Julie Johanson
text: We are very happy with the item that we purchased however, the delivery process really let down the transaction. The delivery person had to be asked several times to bring the sofa into the house which has very easy access. He was intending to leave the sofa on the footpath outside our house. It was just fortunate that my Husband was able to help him. If I had been at home I would not have been able to lift the sofa. This needs to be addressed as the attitude of the delivery person was less than helpful.
